Song.title: You Have Captured Me
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Steve & Vikki Cook Â© 2000 Sovereign Grace Worship

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: I have t[C2]asted of a l[G/B]ove, Sweeter th[Am7]an the honeyc[F]omb And I have h[C2]eard the symphon[G/B]y Of your wh[Am7]isper in my s[F]oul And I am ruined for this w[C/E]orld, For none comp[F]ares with You, my L[G]ord
Chorus: For You have [Am]ca[F]-ptured m[C]e, Comp[G]letely [Am]ca[F]-ptured m[C]e And [G]I'm cons[Dm F]umed [ ]with Y[Em]ou, And only Y[G]ou, J[F2]esus
Verse 2: There's a gr[C2]ace I can't res[G/B]ist, Loving c[Am7]ords are drawing m[F]e And there's a b[C2]eauty far bey[G/B]ond What eyes of fl[Am7]esh could ever s[F]ee For I've beheld with trembling j[C/E]oy The sight of C[F]alv'ry's Scarlet R[G]ose
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 i have tasted of a love sweeter than the honeycomb and i have heard the symphony of your whisper in my soul and i am ruined for this world for none compares with you my lord chorus for you have captured me completely captured me and im consumed with you and only you jesus verse 2 theres a grace i cant resist loving cords are drawing me and theres a beauty far beyond what eyes of flesh could ever see for ive beheld with trembling joy the sight of calvrys scarlet rose
